2.description: Take a picture of a sunset

3.description: Make a small present for your friend without a reason

8.description: Spend 20 minutes reading poetry out loud

9.description: Write down at least five things you feel gratitude for

10.description: Find a song you liked in adolescence and sing it like in karaoke

11.description: Send a short letter to future You in one year using futureme.org

12.description: Watch an old classic movie of your favorite genre

13.description: Spend an hour playing a new trending computer/video/mobile game

14.description: Go for a walk to the nearest park

15.description: Send 10$ to any charity organization you trust

16.description: Find out a new podcast and listen to a first episode

17.description: Quit social media for at least one day

18.description: Write down at least five things you are good at

20.description: Clean up your laptop and mobile screens

21.description: Pick up at least ten stuff you don't use and donate/sell/recycle them

23.description: Taste something you've never tried before

24.description: Write down your five best guesses about the future and send them to future You in five years using futureme.org

25.description: Order take away meal from your favorite restaurant

26.description: Find out more about an artist you know the name but haven't seen their work

27.description: Play drawasaurus.org with your friends online

28.description: Take a picture of the most beautiful building on your street

29.description: Do you morning exercise for at least 20 minutes

30.description: Become a patron for a creator you like on patreon.com or a similar service
